bill_title: provide for the award of punitive damages in certain wrongful death cases.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the award of punitive damages in certain wrongful death cases. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 21-5-7 be amended to read as follows: 21-5-7. In every action for wrongful death the jury may give award such damages as they may think are determined to be proportionate to the pecuniary injury resulting from such the death to the persons respectively for whose benefit such action shall be is brought. The jury may also award punitive damages if the circumstances of the case are such that the decedent would have been able to recover punitive damages in a personal injury case. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
